name: Malin's Cauldron
description:
Malin's Cauldron is a game about gathering ingredients and brewing potions!

Made for CraftJam2018. We didn't have time to implement a feature to get better ingredients, so sadly our crafting system is not used to its full potential... We'll add a few things in post-jam updates.

Credits:

  • Game design & programming: sprvrn
  • Art: Anna from Cabochon Games ; twitter @cabochongames; instagram @cabonchongames
  • Music: Daniel Yehezkeli from Epic Quest Productions; soundcloud, facebook
  • Equipment Extended font by eeve somepx
